summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4196 for the improvement of Cleopatra Place, from West 70th Street to the north margin of Peterson's Addition, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49893, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
